sentences.english: Allow yourself time - everyday - for privacy, quiet, and introspection.
sentences.chinese: 每天自己一点私人时间安静的反省。

sentences.english: A self-critique of this kind can be made anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 自我反省与检讨可以在任何地方进行。

sentences.english: We need time to reflect on our past.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要时间来反省过去。

sentences.english: He now has a long time to reflect on what he has done.
sentences.chinese: 现在他有很长的一段时间来反省他的所作所为。

sentences.english: You can't introspect and find them.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能够反省和发现他们。

sentences.english: I was always questioning myself and trying to bring some real elements to Jennifer.
sentences.chinese: 我不断反省，并努力把詹妮弗这个人物演得真实些。

sentences.english: Check your homework before you hand it in.
sentences.chinese: 把你的家庭作业反省一下然后再交。

sentences.english: You don't self-censor well and think that your opinion always matters.
sentences.chinese: 你不太会自我反省，总认为自己的观点很重要。

sentences.english: Become a learning organization through relentless reflection (hansei) and continuous improvement (kaizen).
sentences.chinese: 通过不停的反省和持续的改进形成学一个学习的整体。

sentences.english: Where it can reflect upon its dogmatic wanderings.
sentences.chinese: 怀疑让理性能反省其教条式的漫游旅程。
他总是不断反省是否言行合理。

sentences.english: Mature woman refelects on herself the moment she discovers her husband has an extramarital affair.
sentences.chinese: 成熟的女人在发现丈夫有婚外恋的首先自我反省。

sentences.english: Silence gives us a chance to reflect on what we have said and heard.
sentences.chinese: 安静让我们有机会反省我们所说所闻。

sentences.english: It is helpful to reflect on what listening to the Holy Spirit is not.
sentences.chinese: 反省一下在哪些情况下没有聆听圣神的话语是有益的。

sentences.english: The best way to stay on course is frequent self-monitoring;
sentences.chinese: 在规定的过程中，最好的方法是经常的自我反省。
